text: "Brothers in Arms" is a 1985 song by British rock band Dire Straits and is the title track to their fifth studio album Brothers in Arms. It went to number 16 in the United Kingdom, number 10 in Ireland, number 5 in New Zealand, number 1 in Poland and number 57 in Australia. It won a Grammy Award in 1987. ==Track listings== 7" single (DSTR 11) # "Brothers in Arms" – 6:04 # "Going Home (Theme of the Local Hero)" (Live) – 4:45 12" Maxi-Single (DSTR 1112) # "Brothers in Arms" (Full Length Version) – 6:58 # "Going Home (Theme of the Local Hero)" (Live) – 4:45 # "Why Worry" (Instrumental Segment) ==References== Category:1985 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Dire Straits songs Category:Blues rock songs
title: Brothers in Arms (song)
